TEXT.S: Cole Aldrich unu syubaykanas-mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, u tebanay mimaliay. Cole Aldrich i 2010 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 1 ku uwacatu silsil11, namapili' tu nu New Orleans Hornets putiput. Cole Aldrich nalecuhan i Burnsville, Minnesota. 10 bulad 31 demiad, 1988 a mihca, Cole Aldrich, miunduay. u puenengan nu kakitizaan niza sa, u tebanay mimaliay.
